sudo addgroup hadoop sudo adduser –ingroup hadoop hduser

wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/hadoop/core/hadoop-1.0.0/hadoop_1.0.0-1_i386.deb sudo dpkg -i ./hadoop_1.0.0-1_i386.deb cd cloudml/var/lib $ sudo tar xzf hadoop-1.0.0.tar.gz $ sudo mv hadoop-1.0.0 hadoop $ sudo chown -R hduser:hadoop hadoop
